* config file shall look like this:

<screenid>/<regexp>/ <screenid>/<regexp>/ ...
<xrandr arguments>
<xrandr arguments>
...

e.g.

# template names:
# $NAME = is <screenid>/regexp/

$IN=LVDS1//
$EXT1=VGA1/fuji/
$EXT2=HDMI3/benq/

# %NAME is automatically generated from $NAME
# it only holds the screenid, the regexp is removed

# exact rule: specific monitors are connected
$IN $EXT1 $EXT2
%IN   --off
%EXT1 --auto
%EXT2 --auto --right-of %EXT1 --primary

# more generic rule:
# there is something connected to EXT1
$IN %EXT1
%IN --auto --primary
%EXT1 --auto

# $IN is connected, ignoring something on other ports
$IN 
%IN --auto
%EXT1 --off
%EXT2 --off
